verses.verse: Thus the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> showed <WH7200> me <WH3335>: and, behold, he formed locusts <WH1462> in the beginning <WH8462> of the shooting up <WH5927> of the latter growth <WH3954>; and <WH3954>, lo, it was the latter growth after <WH310> the king <WH4428>'s mowings <WH1488>.

And it came to pass that <WH3615>, when they made an end of eating <WH398> the grass <WH6212> of the land <WH776>, then I said <WH559>, O Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>, forgive <WH5545>, I beseech thee <WH3290>: how shall Jacob stand <WH6965>? for he is small <WH6996>.
Jehovah <WH3068> repented <WH5162> concerning this <WH559>: It shall not be, saith Jehovah <WH3068>.

Thus the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069> showed <WH7200> me <WH136>: and, behold, the Lord Jehovah <WH3069> called <WH7121> to contend <WH7378> by fire <WH784>; and it devoured <WH398> the great <WH7227> deep <WH8415>, and would have eaten up <WH398> the land <WH2506>.
Then said <WH559> I <WH136>, O Lord Jehovah <WH3069>, cease <WH2308>, I beseech thee <WH3290>: how shall Jacob stand <WH6965>? for he is small <WH6996>.
Jehovah <WH3068> repented <WH5162> concerning this <WH559>: this also shall not be, saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
Thus he showed <WH7200> me <WH136>: and, behold, the Lord stood <WH5324> beside a wall <WH2346> made by a plumb-line <WH594>, with a plumb-line <WH594> in his hand <WH3027>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH5986>, Amos, what seest <WH7200> thou <WH559>? And I said, A plumb-line <WH594>. Then said <WH559> the Lord <WH136>, Behold <WH7760>, I will set a plumb-line <WH594> in the midst <WH7130> of my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>; I will not again <WH3254> pass by them any more <WH5674>;

and the high places <WH1116> of Isaac <WH3446> shall be desolate <WH8074>, and the sanctuaries <WH4720> of Israel <WH3478> shall be laid waste <WH2717>; and I will rise <WH6965> against the house <WH1004> of Jeroboam <WH3379> with the sword <WH2719>.

Then Amaziah <WH558> the priest <WH3548> of Beth-el <WH1008> sent <WH7971> to Jeroboam <WH3379> king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, Amos <WH5986> hath conspired <WH7194> against thee in the midst <WH7130> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>: the land <WH776> is not able <WH3201> to bear <WH3557> all his words <WH1697>.
For thus Amos <WH5986> saith <WH559>, Jeroboam <WH3379> shall die <WH4191> by the sword <WH2719>, and Israel <WH3478> shall surely <WH1540> be led away captive <WH1540> out of his land <WH127>.

Also Amaziah <WH558> said <WH559> unto Amos <WH5986>, O thou seer <WH2374>, go <WH3212>, flee thou away <WH1272> into the land <WH776> of Judah <WH3063>, and there eat <WH398> bread <WH3899>, and prophesy there <WH5012>:
but prophesy <WH5012> not again <WH3254> any more at Beth-el <WH1008>; for it is the king <WH4428>'s sanctuary <WH4720>, and it is a royal <WH4467> house <WH1004>.

Then answered <WH6030> Amos <WH5986>, and said <WH559> to Amaziah <WH558>, I was no prophet <WH5030>, neither was I a prophet <WH5030>'s son <WH1121>; but I was a herdsman <WH951>, and a dresser <WH1103> of sycomore-trees <WH8256>:
and Jehovah <WH3068> took <WH3947> me from following <WH310> the flock <WH6629>, and Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH3212>, Go, prophesy <WH5012> unto my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>.

Now therefore hear <WH8085> thou the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068>: Thou sayest <WH559>, Prophesy <WH5012> not against Israel <WH3478>, and drop <WH5197> not thy word against the house <WH1004> of Isaac <WH3446>;

therefore thus saith <WH559> Jehovah <WH3068>: Thy wife <WH802> shall be a harlot <WH2181> in the city <WH5892>, and thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> shall fall <WH5307> by the sword <WH2719>, and thy land <WH127> shall be divided <WH2505> by line <WH2256>; and thou thyself shalt die <WH4191> in <WH5921> a land <WH127> that is unclean <WH2931>, and Israel <WH3478> shall surely <WH1540> be led away captive <WH1540> out of his land <WH127>.
